name: The North Face Back-to-Berkeley Mid Waterproof Boots - Women's
description: Old-school hiker looks, new-school technology. The waterproof construction keeps feet dry through wet-weather errands and the rubber sole has enhanced cold-weather traction when navigating icy sidewalks.Rich, waterproof leather upper with DryVent™ waterproof membrane.Ortholite® footbed is made with 5% recycled rubber.TPU heel cup adds stability.Dual density EVA midsole cushions underfoot.Winter Grip® rubber outsole with IcePick® temperature-sensitive lugs outsole is designed for traction in winter conditions.
